Package org.dkr.graph.algo.traversal

package org.dkr.graph.algo.traversal
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    BFS<K,​VV,​EV>
    The class BFS computes the BFS order of the vertices in the graph.
    BFS.OrderMessenger<K,​EV>
    if the vertex has been traversed (value > 0), then update its neighbor by value+1
    BFS.OrderUpdater<K,​EV>
    if the vertex has not been traversed (value = 0), then try to update its value
    TopoSort<K,​VV,​EV>
    The Topological Sort Algorithm computes the topological order of each vertex.
